Setup your Eclipse for developing Elastos

From Elastos Developer Website
Jump to: navigation, search


We have build an Eclipse tar file based on Eclipse juno version.
You can get it from here: http://elastos.org/files/DevelopmentTools/Eclipse-juno-ForUbuntu-20120829.tar.gz
Extract it into your computer, run the eclipse directly, everything is OK.
